articles.title: Ukraine lays out $750bn 'recovery plan' for postwar future - The Guardian
articles.description: Volodymyr Zelenskiy says process of recovery will allow his country to deepen its links with Europe
articles.content: The eventual restoration of Ukraine through a $750bn (£620bn) recovery plan is the common task of the entire democratic world, the Ukrainian president said on Monday at the first detailed event to ma… [+4212 chars]

articles.title: Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern 'excellent' to be in Australia - 501s, business and Pacific on the agenda - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: PM is in Australia for five days of meetings after her Europe trip.
articles.content:
PM Jacinda Ardern has spoken with Australian PM Anthony Albanese about the 501s issue, but stressed that the issue could no be resolved in a matter of weeks.

articles.author: Erin Prater
articles.title: WHO monkeypox emergency committee to reconvene ‘shortly’ as cases triple in Europe: It’s a ‘fast-moving outbreak that with every hour, day, and week is extending its reach’ - Fortune
articles.description: The World Health Organization's monkeypox emergency committee will "revisit its position shortly" due to the "rapid evolution and emergency nature" of the global outbreak, the organization said Friday, warning that cases in Europe have tripled since mid-June.
